column4: Problem Solving – PRB1 Framing questions – Students will formulate creative and informed questions in order to investigate problems and develop solutions.
column11: Advanced: Formulates clear and insightful questions that are informed and innovative
column13: Proficient: Formulates clear and competent questions that are informed and creative
column15: Progressing: Formulates vague questions that are somewhat informed and creative
column17: Beginning: Formulates incomplete questions that are uninformed and uncreative
column19: Unsatisfactory: No attempt made to formulate questions to investigate a problem.
